name: Deep in the House
description:
Deep in the House is a short horror game.

After a long and tiring walk, you wander into an old house with an open front door, hoping to find shelter. As you enter the main hall, the door closes and locks itself behind you. It looks like this house isn't as welcoming as you'd hoped... Will you make it out alive ?

Explore the (many) rooms of the house as you try to find a way out. You'll have to fight enemies, collect items and solve (simple) puzzles.

It is recommended to play with sound if you have the option.

This game was created using the PICO-8 fantasy console.
It can be played in a browser, however binaries for Windows, Mac OS and Linux are also available.

Controls
  • Left, Right - Walk / Run
  • C - Open inventory
  • X - Use item
